column4: do you have any idea why would browsers (FF, Opera) wait for a few seconds before even loading sites, 5secs, sometimes a little less, but still... any ideas?
I think there was a speed increase by specifying a DNS server.
it was fast a few days back, but not now...i'll google.
That was yet another issue I had with 9.10. You specify a DNS sever and its speedy then.
